subject: My package, SSN2795
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I placed an order with you on the 1st of October (Order SSN2795) and emailed you about 2 days ago. I haven’t heard any response and there has been no update on my package. I’ve tried to use 17track on your website but my package does not seem to appear. I would really like to know where my package is if possible. 
If there is any news call me on 0414200070

Kind regards,

William Harding

conversations.body_text: Hi william harding,    We apologize for the delayed response; we've just returned from our 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped, and here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045959453704
